definition.name: Azure Spring Cloud
definition.description: Deploy applications to Azure Spring Cloud and manage deployments.
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: azure-subscription
inputs.description: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: action
inputs.description: Action to be performed on Azure Spring Cloud.

inputs.name: service-name
inputs.description: Select the Azure Spring Cloud service to which to deploy.

inputs.name: app-name
inputs.description: Select the Azure Spring Cloud app to deploy.

inputs.name: use-staging-deployment
inputs.description: Automatically select the deployment that's set as Staging at the time the task runs.

inputs.name: create-new-deployment
inputs.description: Whether to target the deployment that's set as Staging at the time of execution. If unchecked, the 'Deployment Name' setting must be set.

inputs.name: deployment-name
inputs.description: The deployment to which this task will apply. Lowercase letters, - and numbers only; must start with a letter.

inputs.name: package
inputs.description: File path to the package or a folder containing the Spring Cloud app contents.

inputs.name: jvm-options
inputs.description: Edit the app's JVM options. A String containing JVM Options. Example: `-Xms1024m -Xmx2048m`

inputs.name: runtime-version
inputs.description: The runtime on which the app will run.

inputs.name: dotnetcore-mainentry-path
inputs.description: The path to the .NET executable relative to zip root.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: The runtime on which the app will run.

latest_release.name: GitHub Action for deploying to Azure Spring Cloud
